data.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege – Ops Icon Charm Bundle
data.detailed_description: Unlock the Original 20 Operator's Icon charms for your weapons. These charms are universal and can be equipped on any weapon in your loadout.
data.about_the_game: Unlock the Original 20 Operator's Icon charms for your weapons. These charms are universal and can be equipped on any weapon in your loadout.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 (DirectX-11 compliant with 1GB of VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x [2GB VRAM] / R9 380 / Fury X)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card 5.1 with latest drivers
